content: Credit Card Insurance Asked by AnonymousAsked on 07 Mar 2019I wish to use CC (Amex) to make payment for insurance premium. Try using axs but Amex not accepted, what other options do i have?Premium Payment?1 answerAnswerBump0

WizardAnswered on 08 Mar 2019Not sure about AXS but you can check with your insurer if they have a credit card payment option for you to directly use the card. They should have a form where you fill up your credit card details and authorize them for payment.0 comments0
